nodes.explanation: personal expressions of opinions or emotions
phrases expressing concern or confidence in various situations
emotional states and reactions such as dismay, regret, alarm, concern, shock, anger, disappointment, and outrage expressed by individuals
phrases related to formal declarations or announcements
declarations of states or actions taken in a formal or official manner
expressions of negative emotions or concerns related to various issues or events
expressions of negative emotions or dissatisfaction
expressions of worry, concern, regret, dismay, outrage, and disgust in statements or reports
mentions of declarations or statements made by individuals or groups
expressions of various emotions or attitudes towards a specific topic or situation
declarations or statements of actions/conditions being taken or put in place
